snippet.title: Exit Limbo: Opening - Trailer
snippet.description:
Feel free to wishlist Exit Limbo: Opening in order to be notified about its release. https://store.steampowered.com/app/1051900/Exit_Limbo_Opening/

Exit limbo is a neo-retro side-scrolling beat ’em up with adventure elements, cool fighting mechanics, memorable enemies and a truly unique setting and visual art style.

For more updates check out our social media channels
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/IndieGala/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/IndieGala
Steam: https://steamcommunity.com/groups/indiegala/
